Class BaseDirectoryService<T>

Namespace
MdFilesMerger.App.Common
Assembly
MdFilesMerger.App.dll

Base implementation of IDirectoryService<T> for IDirectory objects.

Inheritance: BaseService<T> -> BaseDirectoryService<T>
Implements: ICRUDService<T>, IDirectoryService<T>, IService<T> 

public class BaseDirectoryService<T> : BaseService<T>, IDirectoryService<T>, ICRUDService<T>, IService<T> where T : class, IDirectory

Methods

UpdatePath(int, string)

Updates the path of directory/file associated with the element with specified identification number.

public virtual int UpdatePath(int id, string path)

Parameters

id int

The identification number of updated element.

path string

The new path.

Returns

int

Identification number of updated element or -1, if update failed.
